title: Liverpool FC revenue by stream 2018/19
summary: The given chart is of multi-line type with 3 lines namely Matchday, Broadcasting, and Commercial. The y axis represents Revenue by million euros and the x axis represents Year.
Overall Broadcasting is rapidly increasing, Matchday, and Commercial are gradually increasing,  throughout the Year
The lines ordered according to average values of Revenue by million euros in descending order is: 1. Broadcasting, 2. Commercial, and lastly, 3. Matchday.
Overall across the Year, Broadcasting mostly maintained the highest Revenue by million euros when compared to others with a mean value of 145.05, and it peaked at 2018/19.
After Broadcasting, Commercial overall has the second highest values , with a mean value of 130.1, peaking at 2018/19.
The botommost line, Matchday,  has a mean of 66.7, and peaked at 2018/19.
